description.value: Primary Energy: Space 8 (terrifying mental illusion + medium range) Supporting Energy: Time 2 (duration 1 minute) Range: Medium, 60 ft. Duration: 1 minute Total Cost: 10 Energy Action: Complex weave (2 actions) Weaving Roll: Space Potential + Space Mastery / Time Potential + Time Mastery Effect: Target at medium range makes [[/save type=will]]. Compare your weaving successes to their save successes. If you have more, target sees its worst fear made manifest. Target is Frightened and takes [[/damage 3d8 type=psychic]] damage at start of each turn. Can repeat [[/save type=will]] each round to end effect (1 success ends effect). Applies Effects: frightened; fleeing; cowering Damage Type: Psychic (mental) DR Interaction: ignore Saving Throw: Will Success Scaling: 0 = no effect, 1 = Frightened only (no damage), 2 = full effect (Frightened + [[/damage 3d8]] damage), 3 = Frightened + [[/damage 4d8]] damage, 4 = Fleeing + [[/damage 4d8]] damage, 5 = cowering + [[/damage 4d8]] damage
